response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $1,000,000. I am now extending to you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory offer of $950,000. This exclusive offer is available for a limited time only, and I assure you, it represents an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly favorable price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
